component.name: Tempest
component.summary: Weather applet for COSMIC Desktop with automatic location detection

description.p: Tempest is a weather applet for the COSMIC Desktop environment that provides real-time weather information with automatic location detection. It displays current conditions, temperature, and forecasts directly in your panel.

ul.li: Real-time weather data from Open-Meteo API (no API key required)
Automatic location detection via IP geolocation
Current temperature displayed in panel
Detailed popup with comprehensive weather information
Manual refresh button and last updated timestamp
Current conditions including temperature, feels-like, and humidity
Wind information with speed, direction compass, and gusts
UV index, cloud cover, visibility, and atmospheric pressure
Sunrise and sunset times with timezone support
Collapsible hourly forecast for next 12 hours
Collapsible 7-day forecast with high/low temperatures
Configurable temperature units (Fahrenheit/Celsius)
Custom location support (latitude/longitude)
Adjustable refresh interval
Persistent configuration
